meanings.definition: Lack of harmony or agreement between people or things.
meanings.sent1: The family dinner was filled with discord as everyone argued over the vacation destination.
meanings.sent2: The discord between the two friends was evident as they couldn't agree on a movie to watch.
meanings.sent3: The discord over which color to paint the walls led to a hilarious paint fight.
meanings.sent4: The discord in the orchestra created a cacophony of conflicting notes.
meanings.sent5: The discord in the classroom made it hard to focus on the lesson.

meanings.sent5: The discord among the group of friends caused tension during the trip.
